solution_line_template: Donna can finish a total of {episodes_per_weekday} x {weekdays_in_week} = <<{episodes_per_weekday}*{weekdays_in_week}={episodes_weekdays}>>{episodes_weekdays} episodes during the weekdays.

Meanwhile, she can finish {episodes_per_weekday} x {weekend_multiplier} = <<{episodes_per_weekday}*{weekend_multiplier}={episodes_per_weekend_day}>>{episodes_per_weekend_day} episodes each day during the weekend.

The total number of episodes she can watch every weekend is {episodes_per_weekend_day} x {weekend_days_in_week} = <<{episodes_per_weekend_day}*{weekend_days_in_week}={total_episodes_weekend}>>{total_episodes_weekend}
Therefore, Donna can watch {episodes_weekdays} + {total_episodes_weekend} = <<{episodes_weekdays}+{total_episodes_weekend}={total_episodes_week}>>{total_episodes_week} episodes every week.
